Silence::

SHe sighed, showing some displeasure with herself. "I do not know why
I am in such hatred of them. For if they are on the base and working
as our allies, then they must have done something to keep in trust
with you. But surely from the depths of my spark, I am in loathing of
thier kind. Yes sir, as you have so ordered I will not create
dissention in the ranks nor will I create conflict with them. As you
order me to do so, I shall work along side with them and strive to be
a perfect soldier. To complete all tasks at hand without question or
fail."  She lowered her head, "I shall try to keep my personal feeling
just that, personal and not betray them as I have in the past. But if
I may I shall voice them only to you."

She let her head fall in shame. Her sense of honor told her that she
had disgraced herself infront of her commanding officer and will need
to strive to her fullest to regain her honor in his optics.  "Sir, is
there some task for which you have need of me?"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Rodimus:
> 
> "I really apreciate your honestity, Silence"said the male while he
typed a buton and the door closed and he sat down"We don't know why
this happened until your mermories are restored, but I guess that
something happened that made you hate Decepticons and co... But that
isn't the point"said kindly the male"When I received him, I got the
waranty of his sister, that he didn't come with bad intentions and his
brother is of one of my best warriors; both,Organics and Malice, are 
maximals and pretty loyal to MAximal 'cause... and if he had bad
intentions.. he may not openly told me all his story and he had
changed to a less... Decepticon-like appearance; he, also has moved
far a way of  the areas that I know are important for MAximal's base
defence and I don't recive a report that anyone had done an attemp to
do an non-autorized entrance...  "
> 
> Rodimus thought a while and added camly "Silence, the most important
for us is keep peace amoun our ranks..."
